pageContext.claim: “You don't know her [Judge Amy Coney Barrett’s] view on Roe v. Wade. You don't know her view.”
pageContext.analysis: [Judge Amy Coney Barrett] has said she believes life begins at conception and her stated views include plenty of legal criticism of Roe, and in addition, Barrett also has said she believes some court precedents should be overturned even if they are settled law. “The public response to controversial cases like Roe reflects public rejection of the proposition that stare decisis can declare a permanent victor in a divisive constitutional struggle,” she wrote in a 2013 law review article.
